anathema: kill a rightful ruler, become fixated on petty matters such as others’ gender or ancestry, abandon an assassination contract you agreed to pursue
area_of_concern_raw: assassins, divine punishments, the Red Mantis
edict: conduct assassinations, spread the Red Mantis’s infamy, wield sawtooth sabers in combat
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Achaekek (He Who Walks in Blood)](/Deities.aspx?ID=325)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 124

While Achaekek’s divine genesis is debated among scholars, it’s believed that he was created—either by the power of a singular deity or a group of them—to eradicate those who would steal a god’s divinity, and he has since become the enforcer of divine punishment and patron of the Red Mantis assassins.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** conduct assassinations, spread the Red Mantis’s infamy, wield sawtooth sabers in combat

**Anathema** kill a rightful ruler, become fixated on petty matters such as others’ gender or ancestry, abandon an assassination contract you agreed to pursue

**Area of Concern**
assassins, divine punishments, the Red Mantis

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Dexterity

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48)

**Favored Weapon** [Sawtooth Saber](/Weapons.aspx?ID=423)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1577)

- **4th**
[Vision of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1742)

</column><title level="2">Divine Intercession</title>

He Who Walks in Blood detests oathbreakers and bears a particular prejudice against mortals seeking to ascend into divinity, but the Mantis God believes in compensation for selfless duties and rewards the rare individual for their murderous deeds. Violation of his tenets and, occasionally, slights against Grandmother Spider may provoke Achaekek’s wrath. 

**Source** [Gods & Magic - Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=19) pg. 3

<column gap="tiny">
**Minor Boon** You hide among the shadows of death. Once, when you would fail a Stealth check, you critically succeed instead. Achaekek typically grants this boon for an extremely consequential Stealth check that could lead to an assassination, such as one that could get you into position to kill an important target, but rarely on a Stealth check to help you escape.

**Moderate Boon** You gain the god’s approval to take a life. You can cast [_death knell_](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) once per day as an innate divine spell.

**Major Boon** Death lives in your very blade. You gain the sneak attack rogue class feature, dealing 3d6 precision damage. if you already have that class feature, you increase your sneak attack damage by 3d6.
</column>

<column gap="tiny">
**Minor Curse** Achaekek’s minions seek vengeance. Nonsapient insects (especially mantises) become [hostile](/Conditions.aspx?ID=23) against you.

**Moderate Curse** Hubris brings death. Your name and location are mentally projected into the mind of a Red Mantis assassin, who is tasked with eliminating you.

**Major Curse** The Mantis God doesn’t waste his time toying with or tormenting those who truly anger him, or those who dare to consider themselves divine. He rips open a portal to your location, kills you, drags your soul to judgment in a way that prevents resurrection magic, and then leaves.
</column>
name: Achaekek (He Who Walks in Blood)

**Divine Font** Harm

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48)

**Favored Weapon** [Sawtooth Saber](/Weapons.aspx?ID=423)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)
</additional-info>
